src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide
[Java] Class BrowseDrugsActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.app.Activity
      src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.CommonActivity
          src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.LoggedInActivity
              src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.BrowseDrugsActivity

public class BrowseDrugsActivity
extends LoggedInActivity

Activity for browsing drugs This activity is used to display a list of all drugs within the database. The user can search for drugs by entering a string. Once the user has found a drug, they can click it, which will open a ViewDrugActivity.

Authors:
Aidan Wynne Fewster
Version:
1.0
Since:
1.0
